page.title: 08Life Styles.
page.content: 3. The Garage. At the Garage they have five breakdown trucks, one lift and a pit. They have two operations car repairs and long distance relay collection. They go right down to Cornwall if someone breaks down in their car and brings them all home. They sell Esso petrol, and have a workshop with two helpers. Mr. Stevenson is the proprietor. 4. The V.G. Stores. Every day they have about 100 customers. They open at 8.00 a.m. in the morning until 6.00 at night. They sell everything and have three staff. They deliver groceries and sell sweets. The present owners Mr. & Mrs. Walton have been there for three years. It has been recently repainted red and white.
